article_title: People killed and injured in Israeli attack on Jabalia on Friday brought to hospital.
sentence: People  killed  and  injured  in  Israeli  attack  on  Jabalia  on  Friday  brought  to  hospital.

article_title: People killed and injured in Israeli attack on Jabalia on Friday brought to hospital.
sentence: As  we've  just  reported,  at  least  30  people  have  been  killed  in  Israeli  attacks  on  Jabalia  in  the  northern  Gaza  Strip  on  Friday,  according  to  AFP  news  agency  citing  Gaza's  Hamas-run  civil  defence  agency.

article_title: People killed and injured in Israeli attack on Jabalia on Friday brought to hospital.
sentence: Images  show  people  who  have  been  killed  and  injured  being  taken  to  Al  Ahli  Baptist  hospital.
